name: Beatweavers
description:
Beatweavers is a two player twister game for your fingers. 

“Two players influence the Base music differently, changing the weave of the music. Together they make a whole piece.”

---

This game was a part of RISING SEA 2020 -  A collaboration between game creators in South East Asia where game ideas come from unorthodox mediums encouraging creative freedom and experimentation.
